# Extras {#extras}

## Working with Excel spreadsheets

```{r xl}
library(readxl)

xl_sheet <- read_excel("exercises/protein_level_merged_table_empai_reshaped_selected_cols13.1.2020.xlsx")

# Some extra columns to be removed, renaming variables. 
# Variables that are mixtures of numbers and characters
glimpse(xl_sheet)

xl_sub <- xl_sheet %>% select(Accession,Protein.FDR.Confidence.Ahood.080419.OH.3.001,
                    emPAI.Ahood.080419.OH.3.001)

xl_sub %>% mutate(prot_fdr_03 = case_when(Protein.FDR.Confidence.Ahood.080419.OH.3.001 == "0" ~ "Low",
                                          TRUE ~  Protein.FDR.Confidence.Ahood.080419.OH.3.001))
```
